verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: lemon chicken garlic oregano and lemon juice] give spark to this memorable main dish it easy to fix — just brown the chicken in a skillet then let the slow cooker do the work i like to serve this dish to company —walter powell wilmington delaware lemon
